column4: hey guys im running a fresh install of lucid desktop but i was trying to disable gdm autostarting by doing "update-rc.d -f gdm remove" and it didnt work
Lucid uses `upstart` instead of the usual init.d style of scripts, so this may not work as expected.
can you tell me how to disable/enable gdm ?
If update-rc.d doesn't work, then disable it in the /etc/init/gdm.conf file.
